alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Marshall; St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Elkhart, eastern St. Joseph, northeastern Marshall, southwestern Cass and southeastern Berrien Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lakeville, or near Bremen, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gulivoire Park around 820 PM EDT. Osceola around 825 PM EDT. Mishawaka and Roseland around 830 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Georgetown, Granger, Edwardsburg, Niles and Cassopolis. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 74 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
